text: Jim Yong Kim (; born December 8, 1959), also known as Kim Yong (/金墉), is a Korean-American physician and anthropologist. He was born in Seoul. He was the 12th President of the World Bank from 2012 to 2019. On January 7, 2019, he announced that he would be stepping down and left office a month later on February 1. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the World Bank Group Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Asian scientists Category:American anthropologists Category:American physicians Category:People from Seoul Category:Scientists from Iowa Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:South Korean politicians Category:Businesspeople from Iowa Category:South Korean businesspeople Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jim Yong Kim
